long_description: Using an ultra-lightweight blend of nylon fabrics, the Craft ZERO Run socks ensure your feet stay cool and comfortable no matter how far your run takes you. Soft, breathable nylon fabric blend wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly, eliminating chafing and blister formation. Rib-knit arches and cuffs ensure a snug, secure fit. Closeout.
short_description: Using an ultra-lightweight blend of nylon fabrics, the Craft ZERO Run socks ensure your feet stay cool and comfortable no matter how far your run takes you.
